name: UIGraphicsImageRenderer
desc: A graphics renderer for creating Core Graphics-backed images.

items.name: init(bounds: CGRect, format: UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat)
items.desc: Creates an image renderer with the specified bounds and format.

items.name: init(size: CGSize)
items.desc: Creates an image renderer for drawing images of the specified size.

items.name: init(size: CGSize, format: UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat)
items.desc: Creates an image renderer with the specified size and format.

items.name: func image(actions: (UIGraphicsImageRendererContext) -> Void) -> UIImage
items.desc: Creates an image from a set of drawing instructions.

items.name: func jpegData(withCompressionQuality: CGFloat, actions: (UIGraphicsImageRendererContext) -> Void) -> Data
items.desc: Creates a JPEG-encoded image from a set of drawing instructions.

items.name: func pngData(actions: (UIGraphicsImageRendererContext) -> Void) -> Data
items.desc: Creates a PNG-encoded image from a set of drawing instructions.

items.name: typealias UIGraphicsImageRenderer.DrawingActions
items.desc: A closure for drawing an image.
